item.title: Declareplayers(howmany : integer);
item.dc:creator: @Dankness Dankness
item.description:
@Dankness wrote:

why not just use the Player Form include

{.include SRL\SRL\Misc\PlayerForm.Scar}

then use SetUpPlayers which will save all the user data into the proper SRL Char Data file to be retreived via the PlayerForm or the LoadUs command?

item.title: Declareplayers(howmany : integer);
item.dc:creator: @dark_sniper dark_sniper
item.description:
@dark_sniper wrote:

lol simply made this with pyros help(just a lil bit cause i kept geting error after error like access errors… :p)

put how many players in the params and itll set the player array using readln

procedure DeclarePlayers(HowMany : integer); var I : integer; begin HowManyPlayers:=HowMany; NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); for i:=1 to HowMany do begin Players[i].Name := Readln(inttostr(i)+'. players name'); Players[i].Pass := Readln(inttostr(i)+'. players pass'); Players[i].Nick := Readln(inttostr(i)+'. players nick'); Players[i].active := true; end; end;

Read full topic
